overview: Francesco, a young 27-year-old boy, left alone with his father after his mother's death, but whom he will only discover later, having thought he was abandoned, spends his days working the land with his father with whom unfortunately, often, a conflict arises. He goes through various difficulties that lead him to no longer be lucid and to make several mistakes that will eventually distance him from himself, from his father and from his partner. Only later, thanks to a very special friend, the situation will undergo a great change.
title: Io sono
